  • Uses of Updater in com.moleculepowered.api.updater

    Methods in com.moleculepowered.api.updater that return Updater
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    @NotNull Updater
    Updater.addProvider(@NotNull AbstractProvider provider)
    Adds an individual provider into our provider's list, the updater will use these providers to check for new updates and return information about them.
    @NotNull Updater
    Updater.addProviders(@NotNull Collection<AbstractProvider> providers)
    Adds a collection of providers into our provider's list, the updater will use these providers to check for new updates and return information about them.
    @NotNull Updater
    Updater.setBetaToggle(boolean enabled)
    Sets the toggle that determines if this updater should notify audience members of unstable builds as well, such as BETA, ALPHA, etc.
    @NotNull Updater
    Updater.setEnableToggle(boolean enabled)
    Sets the toggle that determines whether this updater should be enabled, If the toggle is set to false, this updater will not check for new updates.
    @NotNull Updater
    Updater.setEventHandler(@NotNull org.bukkit.event.Listener listener)
    Sets the handler that will be called when an update check is completed.
    @NotNull Updater
    Updater.setInterval(@NotNull String input)
    Sets the interval in which this updater will check for updates
    @NotNull Updater
    Updater.setPermission(@NotNull String permission)
    Sets the permission that will be required by audience members in-order to receive update notifications.
